product_name: The North Face Snowdrift Insulated Bib Pants - Toddler Boys'
long_description: The North Face Snowdrift bib pants are perfect for young snow fans. They are insulated, waterproof and ready for everything from making snow angels to linking turns on the bunny hill. Quiet, abrasion-resistant HyVent(R) coated polyester upper and nylon bottom with fully sealed seams is completely waterproof, windproof and breathable. 60g Heatseeker(TM) Aero polyester insulation keeps your child toasty on cold days. Rip-and-stick tabs offer complete adjustability in the shoulder straps. EZ Grow leg cuffs keep up with your child's growth by adding 2 in. length in pant legs when he needs it. Half-elastic waistband with snap closure offers a comfortable fit. Elastic boot gaiters prevent snow from sneaking into boots. The North Face Snowdrift bib pants for toddler boys feature zippered hand pockets, lift ticket loop, key clip and belt loops.
